description.en: Specifies the value of an &ltinput&gt element
description.jp: Specifies the value of an &ltinput&gt element

description.en: Defines a clickable button (mostly used with a JavaScript to activate a script).
description.jp: Defines a clickable button (mostly used with a JavaScript to activate a script).

description.en: Defines a checkbox.
description.jp: Defines a checkbox.

description.en: Defines a color picker.
description.jp: Defines a color picker.

description.en: Defines a date control (year, month and day (no time)).
description.jp: Defines a date control (year, month and day (no time)).

description.en: Defines a date and time control (year, month, day, hour, minute, second, and fraction of a second, based on UTC time zone).
description.jp: Defines a date and time control (year, month, day, hour, minute, second, and fraction of a second, based on UTC time zone).

description.en: Defines a date and time control (year, month, day, hour, minute, second, and fraction of a second (no time zone).
description.jp: Defines a date and time control (year, month, day, hour, minute, second, and fraction of a second (no time zone).

description.en: Defines a field for an e-mail address.
description.jp: Defines a field for an e-mail address.

description.en: Defines a file-select field and a "Browse..." button (for file uploads).
description.jp: Defines a file-select field and a "Browse..." button (for file uploads).

description.en: Defines a hidden input field.
description.jp: Defines a hidden input field.

description.en: Defines an image as the submit button.
description.jp: Defines an image as the submit button.

description.en: Defines a month and year control (no time zone).
description.jp: Defines a month and year control (no time zone).

description.en: Defines a field for entering a number.
description.jp: Defines a field for entering a number.

description.en: Defines a password field (characters are masked).
description.jp: Defines a password field (characters are masked).

description.en: Defines a radio button.
description.jp: Defines a radio button.

description.en: Defines a control for entering a number whose exact value is not important (like a slider control).
description.jp: Defines a control for entering a number whose exact value is not important (like a slider control).

description.en: Defines a reset button (resets all form values to default values).
description.jp: Defines a reset button (resets all form values to default values).

description.en: Defines a text field for entering a search string.
description.jp: Defines a text field for entering a search string.

description.en: Defines a submit button.
description.jp: Defines a submit button.

description.en: Defines a field for entering a telephone number.
description.jp: Defines a field for entering a telephone number.

description.en: Default. Defines a single-line text field (default width is 20 characters).
description.jp: Default. Defines a single-line text field (default width is 20 characters).

description.en: Defines a control for entering a time (no time zone).
description.jp: Defines a control for entering a time (no time zone).

description.en: Defines a field for entering a URL.
description.jp: Defines a field for entering a URL.

description.en: Defines a week and year control (no time zone).
description.jp: Defines a week and year control (no time zone).

description.en: Specifies the value of an &ltinput&gt element
description.jp: Specifies the value of an &ltinput&gt element

description.en: Specifies the name of an &ltinput&gt element.
description.jp: Specifies the name of an &ltinput&gt element.

description.en: Specifies that an input field is read-only.
description.jp: Specifies that an input field is read-only.

description.en: Specifies the width, in characters, of an &ltinput&gt element.
description.jp: Specifies the width, in characters, of an &ltinput&gt element.

description.en: Specifies the URL of the image to use as a submit button (only for type="image").
description.jp: Specifies the URL of the image to use as a submit button (only for type="image").

description.en: Specifies the types of files that the server accepts (only for type="file").
description.jp: Specifies the types of files that the server accepts (only for type="file").

description.en: Specifies that an &ltinput&gt element should be pre-selected when the page loads (for type="checkbox" or type="radio").
description.jp: Specifies that an &ltinput&gt element should be pre-selected when the page loads (for type="checkbox" or type="radio").

description.en: Specifies that an &ltinput&gt element should be disabled.
description.jp: Specifies that an &ltinput&gt element should be disabled.

description.en: Specifies one or more forms the &ltinput&gt element belongs to.
description.jp: Specifies one or more forms the &ltinput&gt element belongs to.

description.en: Specifies the URL of the file that will process the input control when the form is submitted (for type="submit" and type="image").
description.jp: Specifies the URL of the file that will process the input control when the form is submitted (for type="submit" and type="image").

description.en: Defines the HTTP method for sending data to the action URL (for type="submit" and type="image").
description.jp: Defines the HTTP method for sending data to the action URL (for type="submit" and type="image").

description.en: Appends the form-data to the URL in name/value pairs: URL?name=value&name=value.
description.jp: Appends the form-data to the URL in name/value pairs: URL?name=value&name=value.

description.en: Sends the form-data as an HTTP post transaction.
description.jp: Sends the form-data as an HTTP post transaction.

description.en: Specifies the height of an &ltinput&gt element (only for type="image")
description.jp: Specifies the height of an &ltinput&gt element (only for type="image")

description.en: Specifies the width of an &ltinput&gt element (only for type="image")
description.jp: Specifies the width of an &ltinput&gt element (only for type="image")

description.en: Specifies the maximum value for an &ltinput&gt element.
description.jp: Specifies the maximum value for an &ltinput&gt element.

description.en: Specifies a minimum value for an &ltinput&gt element.
description.jp: Specifies a minimum value for an &ltinput&gt element.

description.en: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in an &ltinput&gt element.
description.jp: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in an &ltinput&gt element.

description.en: Specifies that an input field must be filled out before submitting the form.
description.jp: Specifies that an input field must be filled out before submitting the form.

description.en: Specifies the legal number intervals for an input field.
description.jp: Specifies the legal number intervals for an input field.

description.en: Specifies an inline CSS style for an element.
description.jp: Specifies an inline CSS style for an element.

description.en: Specifies extra information about an element.
description.jp: Specifies extra information about an element.
